quote: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any. – Thomas Jefferson
fact: Lightning strikes the earth about 8 million times a day.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Why did the octopus beat the shark in a fight? Because it was well armed.
